name: Cash Solitaire - Win Real Money
description:
Cash Solitaire is a game that not only offers fun gameplay also real cash and physical gift! We have prepared tens of thousands of dollars for lucky players like you!

The game offers solitaire games and classic slots game! Fun and addicting! You can redeem the virtual currency of the game to cash or physical rewards. The more you play, the more you will earn!

Classical Solitaire Games!
Containing two ways of gameplay — deal 1 card or deal 3 cards!
Amazing Rewards! Daily Challenges!
Free scratch cards of incredible rewards!
Play cards anywhere anytime! And win big!
Multiple themes for changing!

Classic slots Game!
Classic slots machine!
Free to play to win Jackpot!

Free to play, play the game, and have a chance to receive real cash and physical rewards!
What are you waiting for? Download now and unlock more fun games! Win cash and physical rewards!

(1) We do not have in-app purchases, nor do we provide any recharge entry, the game is completely free
(2) We have complete guidelines and requirements forprizes, learn more: http://www.shapekeeper.net/songday/tos.html. Please read our rules and guidelines firmly, if players violate rules and guidelines we will not provide rewards for users.
(3) We will only use your personal information when allowed by law. For more details, please refer to our privacy policy: http://www.shapekeeper.net/privacy_policy.html

You also can find us on our official website: http://shapekeeper.net/
